idea:
We take this opportunity to introduce ‘’ Okinox Pure Water LLP; Thane based company established in 2021 in the business of Water Treatment Plants which includes Pre-treatment , Reverse Osmosis , EDI ,Purified water distribution system , WFI distribution system , WFI generation system ,Pure steam generation system and it’s spares providing solution in design , detailing , Manufacture ,Supply , Export ,Installation & Commissioning with more than 25 projects in the domestic region .

Okinox was set up to offer customized total water treatment solution to our client . We are supported by excellent technical ,execution & service team to cater water treatment requirements for various industrial and institutional segments including Power , Chemical , Pharmaceutical ,Sugar , Food & Food & Beverages , Industrial , Residential , commercial , Hotel , Hospital , Townships & many more with proven technologies .

To our credit we have been working with some of the leading companies like Wockhardt, Cipla , J & J etc for their various requirements of water treatment solution.
name: Okinox Pure Water LLP

idea: Fee Only Investment advisers LLP is a SEBI registered Investment Adviser which provides investment advise and tax consultancy to individuals and family offices to aid and assist wealth creation over long term.
name: FEE ONLY INVESTMENT ADVISERS LLP

idea:
Orion knowledge solutions is a training and consulting enterprise for organizational development. We specialize in the design of bespoke training and development solutions to suit individual client needs and budget. Being within a rapidly changing world and technology, it is imperative for MSME business transformation to be equipped with the right set of tools and solutions. We coach, mentor and train business entrepreneurs to achieve their business goals. Orion has expertise on learning need analysis, developing content as per instructional design and creating sustainable change in real business terms. The unique feature of our facilitation is that we engage the participants through enquiry and enable them through application.

Orion has the ability to apply training principles, methodologies to design, develop, and deliver transformation initiatives, competency frameworks, talent management and assessment projects. We are looking at developing and designing psychometric tools for Indian context and management scenarios.
name: Orion Knowledge Solutions LLP

idea: OPTIFILL ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED is a fuel delivery (both online/offline) platform which delivers diesel fuel at your door step for you power generation needs and especially for those who have immovable equipment which normally cannot go to a retail outlet for fueling. Delivery is made possible with state of the art fuel refuelers (Bowsers) fitted with latest automation systems, app based fuel ordering based on your needs. We are looking forward to make fueling easy for the uneasy.
name: OPTIFILL ENERGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: Raising Superstars Enterprises Private Limited is an early stage Edtech startup with an unique idea of helping the parents of 0-2 year old babies raise a prodigy baby. We are using adaptive learning methodologies to customise the activities for each parent and the baby. We are a fast growing company with more than 25000 customers. We are working with an ambition to take our prodigy framework to every new born to leverage the benefits of first 2 months of a baby.
name: RAISING SUPERSTARS ENTERPRISES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
EnvirEra is Agro-waste based startup. We develop an eco-friendly brake pad from agro-waste as a raw material for the automotive industry. The founding team consists of textile researchers who are working in the composites sector. 

When its founders Mr. Dinesh S. Marewad, Dr. Sushant S. Pawar, and Dr. Ravindra V. Adivarekar, from ICT Mumbai, came together with a mission to create ecofriendly products using agro-waste as a raw material.

Our mission to build agro-waste-based products that will reduce the environmental burden as well as it also helps to increase the income of the farmer.
name: EnvirEra

idea: VAIDLEH Lifesciences Private Limited is a company that promises Quality Life for all by providing Quality Medicines at affordable prices and committed to care the people for keeping good health.
name: VAIDLEH LIFESCIENCES PRIVATE LIMITED

idea: I need funding so that i can grow my business to next level
name: Best Tea and Beverages

idea: We at Packscart, aims to provide a common platform for customers, Shop Owners, distributors, vendors and manufacturers, where shop owners can take orders from customers as well as place orders to their distributors and Vendors while manufacturers and (or) vendors can sell directly to shops as well as customers. This makes Packscart your one-stop destination for daily needs. Quick & smarter way to purchase.
name: PACKSCART SOLUTIONS PRIVATE LIMITED
